output:
Map {
User Stories {
    Display Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to view humorous content on the application.
    Search for Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to search for humorous content on the application.
    Share Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to share humorous content with my friends.
    Rate Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to rate humorous content on the application.
    Comment on Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to comment on humorous content on the application.
    Follow Humor Content Creators: As a user, I want to be able to follow humorous content creators on the application.
    Receive Notifications: As a user, I want to be able to receive notifications when new humorous content is posted.
    Customize Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to customize the type of humorous content I see on the application.
    Create Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to create my own humorous content on the application.
    Save Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to save humorous content on the application.
    Report Humor Content: As a user, I want to be able to report inappropriate or offensive humorous content on the application.
}
}
